title: Telegraph Travel Awards 2015/16: win a £25,000 trio of Thailand holidays
text: Tucked away on a lush hillside, overlooking the coast of southern Koh Samui, lies the multi-award winning Kamalaya. Everything in this destination spa is geared for total and complete transformation. It’s just recently been revamped, so the rooms are bright and airy, and the additions of a two-storey fitness centre and a 25-metre pool means it now is also the best looking, and best equipped spa in Thailand, if not Asia. The lucky prize winners will enjoy a seven night ‘relax and renew programme’ for the next three years, which includes three delectable meals per day, unlimited healthy drinks, and a full programme with head/foot and hand massages, as well as daily yoga and meditation, and a host of other blissful treatments. Kamalaya is the ultimate place to go to fix your issues, it’s perfect for the stressed-out, adrenalin-depleted city goer, or for those who want to slow down their pace. How to enter Follow this link to tell us about your favourite travel companies and destinations - and to enter the draw for one of 27 prizes . You will need to leave your name, telephone number and a valid email address. See here for full terms and conditions . What's included International Flights and private transfers to Kamalaya Koh Samui, 7 night Relax & Renew Programme with accommodation at Kamalaya Wellness Sanctuary & Holistic Spa, consultation and advice from your own Healing Holidays expert. The prize Two leading names in the spa world - Healing Holidays and Kamalaya - have partnered to give two lucky winners the chance to improve their health and wellbeing, Kamalaya’s Relax & Renew programme is designed for people in need of the time and place to step back from their lives, recover balance, relax, renew their energy and replenish their spirit. The combination of nurturing therapies, nutrition and personal guidance in a nature-rich healing environment offers the ideal remedy for recovering optimal wellbeing and the inspiration to embrace the future with renewed passion and energy. “Relax & Renew” is the gentlest option among other wellness programs geared towards combating stress and prevent burnout. Whether you would like to focus on stress relief, detoxification, yoga, fitness, weight loss or emotional balance, Kamalaya hosts a range of carefully designed results-oriented holistic programs for various health goals. All of them integrate healing therapies from East and West, a beautiful natural environment and inspired healthy cuisine.. Daily classes include various styles of yoga suitable for different levels of experience, Pilates, meditation, Pranayama, Thai Chi, Qi Gong, Fitball, Stretching, Suspension Exercises, Aqua Aerobics and more. Guests also have access to the world’s most renowned healers who visit Kamalaya throughout the year.. For more info visit www.healingholidays.co.uk/kamalaya The prize provider(s) Healing Holidays is the UK’s leading independent Spa specialist, with a team that offers unrivalled experience of worldwide spas and clinics - we’ve travelled, researched and reviewed extensively and, crucially, we only ever give recommendations based upon personal first-hand experience. We’re constantly on the lookout for the best - from cure-all destination spas to the latest magical medical clinic or secret holistic retreat - we are consistently adding fabulous finds to our impressive collection. With over ten years' experience behind us, we pride ourselves on offering a tailor-made service that ensures the best rates and value for money for our clients, and offer a full price guarantee on all our featured Spas. Many Spas exclusively contract with Healing Holidays, so you can be sure of bagging the best rooms, and have access to the very best therapists and practitioners. Terms and conditions This prize draw is open to residents of the UK, aged 18 years or over, except employees of Telegraph Media Group Limited and its group companies (“Promoter”), Healing Holidays, Kamalaya Wellness Sanctuary and Holistic Spa Resort , their families, agents or anyone else professionally associated with the draw. Details of how to enter form part of the terms and conditions. It is a condition of entry that all rules are accepted as final and that the competitor agrees to abide by these rules. The decision of the judges is final and no correspondence will be entered into. Entries must be submitted by answering a question on www.telegraph.co.uk and entry is restricted to one per person. Once submitted, entries cannot be amended in any way. Late, illegible, incomplete, defaced or corrupt entries or entries sent through agencies and third parties will not be accepted. No responsibility can be accepted for lost entries and proof of despatch will not be accepted as proof of receipt. The winner will be drawn at random from all entries received by the closing date. The winner’s name and county can be obtained by sending a SAE to Healing Holidays Kamalaya Wellness Sanctuary and Holistic Spa Resort Prize, Travel Desk, Telegraph Media Group, 111 Buckingham Palace Road, London SW1W 0DT within one month after the closing date of the prize draw. All entries must be received by 00/00/00 The winner will be contacted within 14 days of the closing date of the prize draw. Should the Promoter be unable to contact the winner or should the winner be unable to accept the prize, the Promoter reserves the right to award the prize to an alternative winner, drawn in accordance with these terms and conditions. The prize does not include personal expenditure or incidental costs, other than where mentioned. It is the responsibility of the prize winner and guest to ensure they have valid passports, health insurance and travel insurance and to obtain any necessary vaccinations and visas for their trip. All elements of the prize are subject to availability, are non-transferable and there are no cash alternatives. Once arrangements have been made and confirmed by Healing Holidays and Kamalaya Wellness Sanctuary and Holistic Spa Resort no subsequent amendments are permitted, and the prize is forfeited if the winner is unable to travel as booked. Travel is not permitted between the periods 01st December-15th January & 15th March-30th April The winner may be required to participate in reasonable publicity on behalf of Healing Holidays and Kamalaya Wellness Sanctuary and Holistic Spa Resort. Entrants’ data will be used for the purpose of administration of this prize draw and in accordance with the permissions granted or withheld at the point of entry. Events may occur that render the prize draw itself or the awarding of the prize impossible due to reasons beyond the control of the Promoter and accordingly the Promoter may at its absolute discretion vary or amend the promotion and the entrant agrees that no liability shall attach to the Promoter as a result thereof. The Telegraph is responsible for the first part of the promotion, which is the publication and adjudication of the prize draw. Provision of the prize is the responsibility of Healing Holidays and Kamalaya Wellness Sanctuary and Holistic Spa Resort. These Terms and Conditions are to be interpreted in accordance with English law and any dispute arising out of these Terms or their subject matter is subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the English Courts.
